results.title: Congenital supravalvular aortic stenosis in a kitten.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular concentric hypertrophy@@@ was noted. Oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ therapy was initiated.

citations.NLM: Szatmári V. Congenital supravalvular aortic stenosis in a kitten. J Vet Cardiol. 2022 Jun;41():227-230. PMID: 35567886
citations.BibTeX: @article{35567886, title={Congenital supravalvular aortic stenosis in a kitten.}, author={Szatmári V}, journal={J Vet Cardiol}, volume={41}, pages={227-230}}

results.title: Obstructive left ventricular hypertrophy. Reversibility of outflow tract obstruction by drug therapy.
results.text_hl: Each @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ derived marked symptomatic benefit from treatment with either a beta-blocker (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@) or @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ antagonist (@CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@).

citations.NLM: Wheeldon NM, Pringle TH, Lipworth BJ. Obstructive left ventricular hypertrophy. Reversibility of outflow tract obstruction by drug therapy. Q J Med. 1992 Aug;84(304):629-36. PMID: 1484941
citations.BibTeX: @article{1484941, title={Obstructive left ventricular hypertrophy. Reversibility of outflow tract obstruction by drug therapy.}, author={Wheeldon NM and Pringle TH and Lipworth BJ}, journal={Q J Med}, volume={84}, number={304}, pages={629-36}}

results.title: Salmonella typhimurium Endocarditis and Myocarditis in a Cat
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ (0.5 mg/kg PO every 12 hours) was administered in view of the severity of @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001024 @@@aortic valve stenosis@@@ and to prevent fatal @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@ventricular arrhythmias@@@, but considering the concurrent mild @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@systolic dysfunction@@@, arterial blood pressure and fractional shortening were assessed twice daily.

citations.NLM: Vercelli A, Lo Cicero E, Pazzini L.  Salmonella typhimurium Endocarditis and Myocarditis in a Cat Case Rep Vet Med. 2019;2019():7390530. PMID: 31886018
citations.BibTeX: @article{31886018, title={ Salmonella typhimurium Endocarditis and Myocarditis in a Cat}, author={Vercelli A and Lo Cicero E and Pazzini L}, journal={Case Rep Vet Med}, volume={2019}, pages={7390530}}
